testcaseName: # 2 Pediarix at 7 yrs; # 1 at less than 12 mo.
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from previous dose (catch-up)
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child is administered Pediarix as the second dose of the DTaP vaccine at age 7 years and a first dose at less than 12 months that the dose valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange: Past Due Date was missing and child is in catch-up.  Past Due Date added to align with Recommended Date.
